room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Been here twice. Both times it was loads of fun and the staff couldn't have been nicer / fun to interact with. Nice to have ample parking as well and they have multiple different fun challenges. If you're using Google maps to go there, the maps say you arrive before you do; just keep going around to the back.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: I love this place! I’ve done (and completed) almost every room they have (only one we haven’t done is the casino) and I am planning on doing all of them!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Awesome time yesterday! On vacation with my boyfriend and his friends. It was soo much fun. The Do Not Disturb room was amazing. Staff was super friendly and our game master was cool. The dude who checked us in was also really cool and thanked us for coming and told us to have a great vacation.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: My friends and I love escape rooms! We did two in one day this weekend at Breakout Games (Boston) and it was so fun! The staff were so friendly and helpful! Their rooms are challenging and an absolute blast! Can't wait to do more of them at this location.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: I love figuring out puzzles and cracking codes. I love the movies National Treasure and DaVinci Code. Escape rooms are my new favorite thing! Today my family and I beat the Do Not Disturb room with 8 minutes left. So psyched! It was so much fun! Can’t wait to beat another one.
